Translations.Text: Klyanus' neprelozhno Dnom voskreseniya, yavlyayushchimsya neprerekayemoy istinoy
i dushoy, uprekayushchey samoye sebya za pregresheniya i nebrezhnoye ispolneniye religioznykh obyazannostey, chto vy budete voskresheny, kogda budut sobrany vashi razbrosannyye kosti
Neuzheli chelovek - posle togo, kak My sotvorili yego iz nebytiya, - dumayet, chto My ne soberom yego razbrosannyye istlevshiye kosti
Da, My soberom ikh. My zhe sposobny vosstanovit' dazhe yego pal'tsy, sobrav samyye melkiye ikh sustavy. Yesli eto tak, to sobrat' bol'shiye kosti yego tela Nam budet legko
Neuzheli chelovek otritsayet voskresheniye, zhelaya prodolzhat' rasputnichat' vse ostal'nyye dni svoyey zhizni
On sprashivayet, schitaya nevozmozhnym Sudnyy chas: "Kogda nastanet Den' voskreseniya
V tot Den', kogda zakatyatsya glaza ot uzhasa i udivleniya
i zatmitsya luna
i ob"yedinyatsya solntse i luna, voskhodya s zapada
chelovek sprosit: "Kuda zhe bezhat', chtoby spastis' ot nakazaniya
Net zhe! Ne ishchi, o chelovek, ukrytiya ot nakazaniya
Net dlya tebya spaseniya, krome kak u Allakha - tvoyego Gospoda, kotoryy reshit: kogo vvesti v ray, a kogo vvergnut' v adskiy ogon'

V tot Den' vozvestyat cheloveku o tom, chto on sovershil pri zhizni i pozzhe (t.ye. yesli on pri zhizni sovershal blagiye ili nechestivyye deyaniya, a drugiye lyudi, posle yego smerti, sleduya za nim i podrazhaya yemu, sovershali podobnyye deyaniya)
Ved' chelovek (v Den' voskreseniya) budet svidetel'stvovat' o tom, chto on sovershil ili ne ispolnil
I dazhe yesli on postarayetsya nayti sebe opravdaniye, to on ne smozhet izbavit'sya ot etogo svidetel'stva
Ne povtoryay, o Mukhammad, (za Dzhibrilom) Koran vo vremya Otkroveniya, zhelaya bystro chitat' i vyuchit' yego naizust'
Poistine, zapechatlet' yego v tvoyom serdtse i utverdit' yego na tvoikh ustakh (chtoby ty naizust' vyuchil yego) - Nashe delo
Kogda Nash poslanets chitayet Koran tebe, sleduy za yego chteniyem, vnimatel'no slushaya yego
Potom na Nas lezhit raz"yasneniye togo, chto nedostupno tebe iz mysley Korana i yego ustanovleniy
Osteregites' otritsat' voskreseniye, ved' ono - istina. No net, vy lyubite prekhodyashchuyu zemnuyu zhizn' s yeyo mirskimi blagami
i prenebregayete budushchey zhizn'yu s yeyo blazhenstvom
V tot Den' u odnikh lyudey litsa budut siyayushchimi, schastlivymi
i budut smotret' na svoyego Gospoda, kak podobayet Yemu
U drugikh zhe litsa budut ugryumymi, mrachnymi
Oni ozhidayut, chto ikh postignet strashnaya beda, sokrushayushchaya pozvonki khrebta
No net! Osteregaytes' lyubvi k etoy zhizni, kotoruyu pokinete, kogda dusha doydot do gortani
i prisutstvuyushchiye pri umirayushchem sprosyat drug druga: "Net li zaklinatelya, chtoby zagovorit' yego ot smerti
I poymot umirayushchiy, chto on skoro umrot i pokinet zemnuyu zhizn', kotoruyu lyubil, i stanet yemu neimoverno tyazhko
i kogda soydotsya golen' s golen'yu pri izvlechenii dushi
k tvoyemu Gospodu budet v tot Den' vozvrashcheniye, a v Den' Voskreseniya ikh ili vvedut v ray, ili vvergnut v adskiy ogon'
